attributes.action: Random drug test members of the parliament.
attributes.additional_details:
8 toilets in the house of parliament have been found to have been contaminated with the illegal substance cocaine.
Certain members of the house on one or more occasion have raised suspicion due to there appearance/demeanour.
attributes.background: We the citizens of the United kingdom require nee demand that our members of parliament make themselves available for random, independent drug tests (as many of the population have to). UK employment law says if an employer would like to have an employee tested for the influence of drugs

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105070

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
